thumb.title: □ Saya and Fuminori embark on a galaxy capture tour | ( Source of drawn animation from Onisigma )
thumb.description: Source of animation of painted Fuminori and Saya is taken from a video by Onisigma ( https://www.youtube.com/@onigokira ) Original: https://youtube.com/shorts/kCpGz5_yK8k?si=DPR7z06yVIGjZaSUSong: Toy-Box - E.T.沙耶の唄I saw a positive animation from Onisigma and I liked it so much that I wanted to do something with it all.Earlier I had an idea for a joke video "Saya's budding scheme", but I never finished it. Maybe one day... But the ending, you could say, was made according to this very concept.When I saw the previously mentioned animation by Onisigma, an idea came to mind of how it could be decorated and continued. True, since the animation was on a white shimmering background, it was not possible to adequately remove the white background and that's why the cut looks so rough. However, I made the video in the mood, for the sake of a joke, so it's okay :)
